content: christmas toadstools materials dk yarn in red and white 3 25mm double pointed needles cast on 6 stitches in white join in the round r1 knit r2 kfb r3 -r7 knit 5 rounds r8 k2tog k2 r9 knit r10 k2tog k1 r11 kfb 12 stitches r12 kfb 24 stitches r13 kfb k3 r14 kfb k4 change to red r15 knit r16 purl r17 - r18 knit r19 k2tog k10 r20 knit r21 k2tog k9 r22 knit r23 k2tog k2 r24 knit r25 k2tog r26 k2tog k1 draw thread through remaining stitches and fasten_off you can use the remaining yarn to make a hanging loop if you want to make the toadstool a decoration using white yarn embroider spots onto the top of the toadstool
